ing: 1 (4 ounce) jar pimento peppers, chopped with juice reserved
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
des: "This is a classic appetizer cheese spread that can be spread on crackers or onto bread."
ins: In a medium bowl, stir together the chopped pimentos, their juice, and the mayonnaise. Add the cheese, and stir until thoroughly coated. Stir in the pecans and season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately, or refrigerate until serving.
